BIO

My first degree is a bachelor of business administration and I have previously worked as an export manager. My passion for technology redirected me to have a career change. I started coding as a hobby and not long after that I decided to invest in a carrer change by taking a computer science graduate coursework at the University of Melbourne. In 2022 I will commence a masters degree coursework in information technology. My goal is to work as a software or cyber security engineer as I found passion in delivering creative, secure and usable applications. I also hope to become a member of a company where I can be recognized by my contributions and achieve mutual growth.

  • * Backend Development with Node.js or Django
  • * OOP software development with Java and basic server programming
